Package input

Class InputHandler

java.lang.Object
input.InputHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreditsInput, PauseInput, PlayInput, SettingsInput, TitleInput, WinLoseInput
public abstract class InputHandler extends Object implements KeyListener
Handles input from the player's keyboard.
Author:
Jeffrey Jin (jjj9), Long Nguyen (dln3)
